sentences.en: a scheme which lets tenants buy their homes at a discount.
sentences.cn: 可以让租户以折扣价买房的计划。

sentences.en: Eagle Star offers a 10% discount to the over-55s.
sentences.cn: 鹰星公司给予年龄在55岁以上的顾客10％的折扣。

sentences.en: Experts discounted the accuracy of the polls.
sentences.cn: 专家对这次民意调查的准确性不以为然。

sentences.en: Full-time staff get a 20 per cent discount.
sentences.cn: 全职员工享受20%的折扣。

sentences.en: Games were discounted to as little as 5.
sentences.cn: 游戏减价到只要5美元。

sentences.en: General Hausken had not discounted the possibility of an aerial attack.
sentences.cn: 豪斯肯将军没有忽视空袭的可能。

sentences.en: His statement does not discount the possibility of change.
sentences.cn: 他的说法并不否定变化的可能性.

sentences.en: However, traders tended to discount the rumor.
sentences.cn: 然而，商人往往不相信这一谣传。

sentences.en: I can give you a small discount.
sentences.cn: 我可以给你打点折扣.

sentences.en: I'll sell at a discount in return for a speedy sale.
sentences.cn: 为了尽快售出，我会打折销售。

sentences.en: In 1979, Liquor Barn thrived as a discount merchandiser.
sentences.cn: 1979年，LiquorBarn烈酒折扣店的生意十分红火。

sentences.en: Only a five percent discount ? How about twenty percent?
sentences.cn: 只打九五折? 八折怎么样?

sentences.en: That store does not discount at all.
sentences.cn: 那家商店出售商品一概不打折.

sentences.en: The Young Persons Railcard gives you a discount on rail travel.
sentences.cn: 持青年人卡乘火车可以享受折扣。

sentences.en: They are often available at a discount.
sentences.cn: 它们经常可以以折扣价买到。

sentences.en: They give 10 % discount for cash payment.
sentences.cn: 现金付款,他们给以九折优待.

sentences.en: This has forced airlines to discount fares heavily in order to spur demand.
sentences.cn: 这迫使航空公司对机票大幅打折来刺激需求。

sentences.en: You can ask a dealer for a discount whether you pay cash or buy on credit.
sentences.cn: 无论是付现还是赊购，都可以要求经销商打折。

sentences.en: You can discount what Jack said: he's a dreadful liar.
sentences.cn: 杰克说的话你不必当真,他可是个说谎大王.

sentences.en: You should accept his statement with some discount.
sentences.cn: 你听他的话要打个折扣.

sentences.en: You should discount what he says.
sentences.cn: 你听他的话要打个折扣。

phrases.tran_cn: 打折的。 比较 at a premium (见 premium)
现金收支折现法；贴现现金流

trans.tran_en: a reduction in the usual price of something
to reduce the price of something

trans.tran_cn: 把…打折扣； 不信； 漠视； 低估
trans.tran_en: to reduce the price of something
